character_name: Clark Kent / Superman: The Kryptonian superhero whose alter-ego is a mild-mannered farmer-turned-journalist.
Lois Lane: A reporter who works with Clark Kent at the Daily Planet
Richard White: The nephew of the Daily Planet editor-in-chief Perry White and fianc√© to Lois Lane. Marsden said Richard acts as an emotional challenge for Superman
Perry White: The editor of the Daily Planet.
Martha Kent: Clark Kent's adoptive mother.
Kitty Kowalski: Lex Luthor's henchwoman. She served as a prison nurse and would give Lex his examinations.[6] The character is based on Eve Teschmacher from the 1978 film
Jimmy Olsen: a photographer at the Daily Planet and a friend of Clark.

Lex Luthor: A sociopath armed with vast resources and an extensive knowledge of science who is Superman's nemesis. Spacey's version of Luthor has the same comically exaggerated vanity and pompous arrogance of the earlier Gene Hackman version
